about_the_game:
Embark on an epic adventure in this classic, pixel-art, JRPG. Take part in the land's lore, meet new friends, interact with NPCs, and fight different enemies.


On your journey, you will explore a rich variety of forests, mountains, waters, caves, and dungeons. Small villages, and prosperous cities. You will also collect various valuable resources through fishing, mining, and farming.


You will meet many different enemies as you travel through the lands. The game uses a fast-paced, turn-based battle system, where the different enemies have unique elemental weaknesses. Magic and various buffs/debuffs play a big role in battles. Tailor your party members' unique magic abilities, with the help of different elemental orbs.

The game features:



  • 16-bit graphic style
  • A vast world to explore
  • Every character has his/her unique side quest
  • Open-world gameplay based on exploration
  • Optional side quests
  • Tailor your party members' unique magic abilities.
  • World based on Slavic and Nordic tales
  • Fast-paced, turn-based battles
  • Lots of wonders, adventure, and exploration
